name: Deckweaver: Descent Into Chaos
description:
In the fantasy realm of Alveria, step into the shoes of The Wanderer, a daring adventurer who draws their power from a deck of enchanted cards. However, dark and malevolent forces in the form of Lovecraftian monstrosities have descended upon the realm, spreading corruption and chaos throughout the land.

As The Wanderer, you must brave the hostile terrain of Alveria, venturing into the very heart of this malice to purify the shrines that lie within. Your ultimate goal is to summon a portal to The Great Abyss, the shadowy realm from which these terrifying creatures emerge, and confront the Elder Being at its heart.

Only by destroying this malevolent force can you hope to save Alveria from certain doom. So gather your strength, sharpen your wits, and prepare to face the ultimate challenge in this epic adventure of heroism and magic!

The agents of chaos are powerful and runs will be tough. If you are defeated, rest up and venture out to try again in this First Person Deckbuilding Roguelike .

Features:
Find and choose from 30+ different cards to weave into your deck of spells.

Slay agents of chaos as you battle through different maps and environments, purging chaos wherever it stands.

Collect artifacts that alter the way you play and explore.

Face off against Chaos itself in an epic boss battle to save Alveria.
